summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Commission for Sexual Minorities; changing the name of the Seattle Commission for Sexual Minorities to the Seattle LGBT (Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender) Commission; amending Chapter 3.14 of the Seattle Municipal Code to reflect the name change; and authorizing the Code Reviser to make changes over time to all references elsewhere in the Seattle Municipal Code necessary to reflect the name change.
committee: Culture, Civil Rights, Health and Personnel
